text: Héctor Lechuga (18 April 1929 - 13 July 2017) was a Mexican actor, comedian, political commentarist and radio personality. He is known for his roles in Peluquero de señoras (1973), México 2000 (1983) and Masajista de señoras (1973). Lechuga died on 13 July 2017 of a heart attack after suffering from Alzheimer's disease at his home in Xalapa, Veracruz at the age of 88. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1929 births Category:2017 deaths Category:People with Alzheimer's disease Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican comedians Category:Radio personalities Category:People from Veracruz
title: Héctor Lechuga
